entry.title: The Four Musketeers
entry.content: 🎥 The Four Musketeers, 1974 ⭐️ ★★★½ The Four Musketeers is definitely the brain, and maybe even the heart . It's a natural continuation of the first film, picking up exactly where it left off . The cas... 🔗 https://letterboxd.com/julienpierre/film/the-four-musketeers/ #FilmReview
